title: allow people to voluntarily opt out of autofill
body: if riot is about making the game better they would not have autofill on 24/7. they should simply allow people to opt out and wait for their choice of lane. if people played their lane of choice i think people would have more fun than they do. like the title says just let people have the choice.

replies.body:
We had that before. It forced anyone willing to Support from time to time to be Support Mains until they opted out too. You'd end up with everyone just opting out instead of fixing the problem.

Next season they're going to transition to a separate MMR per role, which should help.

when dynamic Q started we did not have autofill. that was the best time in ranked. if you want to wait for your choice role then you should be able to.  they could add a 3rd choice in role preference that would help fill other spots. i will always maintain that free choice is better than auto fill.

Your "free choice" came at the cost of everyone else's choice. You couldn't chose Support Secondary or Fill without becoming locked in as a Support every time. They couldn't chose to put those secondary options or they'd be locked out of their desired role.

You're thinking on an individual level instead of systematically. One person waiting longer for their desired role isn't a problem, unless it forces a situation where everyone who wants to get their desired role has to wait longer or they get their less desired role more often. And who *doesn't* want their desired role?

So in this case what they should do is if you opt out of Autofill your Queue times will go up until it finds a game that would be a fit for you. This shouldn't be that bad due to the fact that I as a Plat 2 Ekko OTP gets autofilled as support then guess what my team is SOL because of Autofill. Autofill would be a fine add on for someone who is on all around player, but me as a mid laner especially as an OTP would benefit my team if I was in my main position. I might better almost Diamond Level Ekko Mid Laner, but I am not in other positions so why put me there.
For you, the new Ranked system will be helpful, since you'll have a separate rank for Mid than you would have on the other roles. It's a far more elegant solution than removing Auto Fill.

Either way its not implemented yet so there needs to be another solution for now.
There is a solution for now. It's the same solution that existed before - be a well rounded player. If you don't want to use that solution that's on you.

Why be well rounded when you can specialize. Thats why specialists make more money than general practitioners. It was easier to be well rounded when there was no designated lanes and you have to play with what was left which I was a gold player back then, but now that I have specialized in my lane and have moved to high plat obviously my other skills have dwindled. 

It is best to do 1 thing superbly instead of 5 things adequately. and while I have won autofill games I just don't want to do top or adc I don't mind support or jungler but again I would prefer to be where I am most confident.

ITT: People who don't play ranked discuss queue times that they actually have no experience with. Queue times have never been a problem below Challenger. Even my Diamond I queues a few seasons ago were usually only 5-6 minutes.

Also, at Diamond, auto-fill is largely ADC and jungle. Support auto-fill is very rare. It also auto-fills to start games very aggressively.

Even if you are a well rounded player, you get your desired role 9/10 times, and will be extremely out of practice with the three other roles. This might hold up in low brackets, but you can't play an out-of-practice role against a Diamond+ player who mains that role.

people have already been on board with waiting and not caring about the wait if everybody gets their desired role. id rather play 1 great game then play 2 marginal to bad games due to the support being autofilled by a player who just locks in a carry and plays carry. as opposed to being the support. rather wait for the person who really loves to be a support. if riot wants to force people to be support then maybe lock out all champions not classified as support. so that the person who got autofilled plays the role.... however this gose against my belief in free choice being king and the best way.
